about_the_game:
The Kickstarter is now live. Please go and support it!




Welcome to a new galaxy! You are Samual, a simple farmer that lives in a small, abandoned town called First Valley. You live there with your daughter Sam who is the light of your world. One day you are attacked, and your daughter is taken away from you!

You are now on a grand adventure to save your daughter. While you are on this journey you will explore a vast, diverse universe, make new friends (and enemies), and hopefully find some Gem Worms!


Featuers

Isometric and Platforming areas!

Most retro RPGs are either isometric in nature or they are platformers throughout the entire experience. At the very beginning of making this game, I knew I wanted to be able to have both experiences meshed into one. I still think for games that have just one of the two are great but having both adds a nice bit of variety and can be an integral part to the story.


Turn based combat

This game has turn based combat! (Wow what a revolutionary FeAtUrE!) Most combat situations will change fight to fight, depending on location and who you encounter.

Spare or Finish?

After every fight, you will be given the option to either Spare or Finish your enemies.
Depending on what you do will change the world around you in a variety of ways. Just because you think it is the right decision, doesn't mean it was a good one.

Lets meet some characters.


Samual-
Samual is the main protagonist in this great adventure. He might not look like much, talk much, fight well, or dress cool. But!!!..........


Ace Stud-
Samual's new best friend and the best pilot you will ever meet. And watch out! This stud might hit you with his hot flinger guns.


Barrel Elf-
A strong foe that is pretty well protected by that barrel. never leave home with out your knife kids.


Doug-
A Doug has got to dig!


Cromp-
Cromp is not a rich or a poor kid, but somewhere right in the middle. Cromp finds it hard to fit in the playground and at the dinner table. But that won't bring him down! Cromp is super passionate about two things; Making people smile and slamming away on his Bonker drums. He practices every moment he is not at school or being pestered by his 23 siblings. One day, he wants to start a band and try to make people smile all over the universe. His dad laughs at him and just wants him to join the family business of snark shaving. But nothing will stomp on this Cromps dreams. He is going to keep grinding and get better every day. He hopes one day to make you, and everyone else out there, smile.
